root: ^The tent is eerily quiet, and appears much larger now that the people normally packing it has long dispersed. Still, the lights brightening the empty expanse implies not everybody has left for the night.
^Everything’s going according to plan. After all, It would be a strange thing to do- Hide in a circus past closing time for no reason?
^No, you were there with sensible, normal motivations. Like finding one of those incredibly charming clowns.
^With no license to be there at this hour.
^…I mean, where else is the clown dating pool located? This, to you, was the perfect place to find love.
